commits.message: feat: complete comprehensive user documentation and fix buffer overflow

ai.title: Docs & CoDescribe Enhancements: Expanded Workflow & User Guide
ai.body:
This PR significantly enhances the CoDescribe workflow and documentation.  Key changes include:

* **Extensive Documentation Updates:** The `docs/` directory has been heavily revised and expanded. This includes the addition of a new `USER_GUIDE.md` and `WORKFLOW_REFERENCE.md`, major updates to `GETTING_STARTED.md` and `WARP_QUICK_REFERENCE.md`, resulting in a more comprehensive and user-friendly documentation set. 
* **CoDescribe Workflow Improvements:**  The underlying CoDescribe workflow has been improved, as evidenced by the numerous additions to the `.codescribe/history/` and `.codescribe/logs/` directories.  These changes are primarily internal but contribute to a more robust and efficient workflow. 
* **kiro Spec Updates:** Minor modifications were made to `.kiro/specs/enhanced-codescribe-workflows/tasks.md`, aligning with the enhanced workflow and updated documentation.

This update provides a much improved user experience and a more complete understanding of the CoDescribe tool and its capabilities.  The updated documentation clearly outlines the enhanced workflow.
ai.summary: This PR significantly expands CoDescribe documentation and improves the underlying workflow, resulting in a more user-friendly and robust tool.

architectureDiagrams.title: Project Architecture
architectureDiagrams.mermaid:
graph TB
    subgraph "Frontend Layer"
        UI[User Interface]
        COMP[Components]
    end

    subgraph "Business Logic Layer"
        SERV[Services]
        WORK[Workflows]
    end

    subgraph "Data Layer"
        API[API Clients]
        CACHE[Cache]
    end

    subgraph "External Services"
        GH[GitHub API]
        LIN[Linear API]
        AI[AI Services]
    end

    UI --> COMP
    COMP --> SERV
    SERV --> WORK
    WORK --> API
    API --> GH
    API --> LIN
    API --> AI
    SERV --> CACHE

    classDef frontend fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2
    classDef business fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#7b1fa2
    classDef data fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#388e3c
    classDef external fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#f57c00
    class UI,COMP frontend
    class SERV,WORK business
    class API,CACHE data
    class GH,LIN,AI external
